divs: Sighting Detailsfeeding my dogs tabel scraps whith my wife, we were looking up at the stars wilewaiting for them to finish.we were looking at the stars when one of the stars shot out light simillar to ablotorch flame out.then the star squerted out somthing simillar to toothpastebeing squezed out. then what had sqezed out expanded indiferent directions untilit ended up four different masses. the first was the size of a football feildand about the same shape and about 50 feet thick but the textur and color lookedlike it was made of multin lave. the three smaller masses flew in formationbehind the first, they all had no noise or vibration. i yeld for my children andmyto sons came out i had my cordless 1,000,000 candel power spotlight in my handso i shined it at the largest mass and we could see the light hit it and slowlygo by so i tuned the light off and we watched them slowly fly south east about150 to 300 feet off the grond untill we couldent see them anymore witch tookabout 5 minuts. so we did the logicul thing and called 911 to see if anyone elsehad reported and sigtings, they said no and took are name and told us if theyhurd any thig they would call us back, they never did.
